To all normal-sized people, Ethan was already big. Ethan had big hands, big feet, long arms and legs. He had a friendly expression on his face with short brown curly hair and deep brown eyes. He had a deep voice and he was usually rather shy when he was around other people.

Ethan played soccer after school and he liked to play music using his mixer in his bedroom while he was studying or doing his homework assignments.

You step on to his big hand. He had a large palm and long, narrow fingers. He gently raised up his hand so he could take a closer look at you. As big as he seemed to you, you figured that you must have seemed really tiny to him!

Ethan walked up the stairs and entered his room where he switched on the light. From there, he set you down on his desk where he turned on the laptop and pulled out a binder and a book out of his backpack.

You sat down on his desk and you observed whatever he was doing. The giant boy got a large cup of water out of kitchen before he found a tiny plastic cup in the bathroom, which he filled with water for you.

"Sorry... This is the smallest cup I could find, little guy!"

The cup is big but you can still lift it and drink from it!

You sit down and watch quietly as Ethan writes some things in his binder. He is reading some text from his book and then he writes some lines in his notebook. He plays music from his laptop, which sits next to a big gray machine which is his mixer.

1431311211111.content:
As you keep on walking towards what appears to be the back of the goal you’re suddenly startled as you hear several players running towards you! Luckily the net separates you from the players, not to mention the fact that big Ethan is guarding the front of the goal as well.

There is a commotion! Several of the people standing near the sidelines are screaming! One of the players on the opposing team kicked the ball right at the goal… Ethan leaped into the air and made a tremendous save! And it all happened right before your very eyes!

Ethan landed in the goal while holding the ball with both hands! Luckily, he got up right away and kicked the ball back to one of his teammates. That was just amazing!

You look up and see him standing there, with his gloved hands, leaping from side to side as he’s ready to jump up or dive to either corner, ready to defend his goal from any attacks. He is one outstanding goalie! Nothing seems to get through him!

Finally, there was a loud, long whistle. The ref blew the whistle and all the players walked off the field. Ethan walked away, leaving you behind for just a brief moment. You felt a little sad and lonely, especially with you being out there, behind the goal, and so far away from the sideline where the benches are. The distance seems like hundreds of miles to you and there is no way you could cover that alone. Has Ethan forgotten about you?

But wait! You look up and see someone running towards the goal. A tall, muscular boy is running your way. You smile. It’s him! It’s hard not to recognize him because he’s so big. But you can’t help but smile when you realize Ethan’s coming straight towards you!

“Hey, little bro!”

Giant soccer cleats suddenly appear before you. As you look straight in front of you, you see the giant shoes with the hard spikes approach you before the stop. Then, the giant squats down and sits next to the backpack, where he reaches out with his long arm and grabs his water bottle. Another hand reaches over to you and lifts you up and gently places you on his left thigh.

You sit down on his thick, muscular thigh, craning your neck and looking up at the giant boy.

“Do you like the game so far?” Ethan asks you.

“Uhh…. Yeah… So, what’s the score?”

“It’s 2-0 for us already…” Ethan replies, smiling back at you. “I think we got this one in the bag! But we still need to play the second half. They need to score two goals just to tie us and three to beat us but I doubt that’s gonna happen!”

“You made a pretty impressive save before halftime!” You say to your giant friend.

“Thanks!”

He takes a big gulp from his water bottle when the whistle is blown again.

“Okay! Back to work! Just stay here! I’ll get you after the final whistle! We can go swimming or camping afterwards, alright?” Ethan says to you.

You arrive at the water park, swimsuit clad women and men were all around you, and being the size you were, everything about them was 'bigger'.

"Well if I have to be this size, I might as well enjoy it." you said with a smile.
You should probably find your boss to tell them that you are here, to your left you saw a water slide which looked like it would be a lot of fun before a days work, especially at your size, to your right you saw some simple lawn chairs but the sun was beaming down promising an enjoyable tanning situation.

What should you do?

153.content:
You work at a gas station, selling lottery, snacks, cigarettes, denying teens cigarettes, and any other things here and there. You figure it will be a bit of a struggle to work today, but your mom drops you off at the counter and leaves. Every item looks huge to you, as you are incidentally asked to help stock shelves. Your coworker Nancy, a 50 something mother of 4, tired pudgy woman comes up to the counter.

"Stan oh my god is that you?" she says is awe at your tiny form
"Yes it is, and before you ask let me explain what happened...." you say as you realize how old this story of telling the origin of your shrinkage will get.

"Well anyway, the boss wants us to stock shelves, i guess ill just set you on top of the taller shelves and hand small items to you, ok?" she asks, not asking really as she wisks you away in her palm to the shelf. Nancy hands you small items like tissue packs other items, working her way up to the heavier items. You sway back and forth with the items, barely able to handle them, that last one almost knocked you off! Nancy tosses you a bottle of shampoo, you catch it but the enormous weight of it sends you to the edge. You tumble off the shelf right into the cart of.....
153.title: Convience Store

choices: Yes, Cashier Puts Stan on the side to continue with the man's purchase
No, Stan gets put inside the grocery bag and is taken along with the giant man
1532.content:
You landed with a thud into the cart along with the shampoo luckily you have landed on top of a box of cookies that managed to break your free and preventing you from falling to your death. "Phew I could've been badly injuried' you stated as a massive shadow looms over you. You look up and notice a giant muscular built man wearing a tank top that seem to be tight for his bulging muscles and a tattoo on his left arm of some kind of dragon. The muscular giant continued pushing the cart unaware of Stan who's landed within the giant's cart. As the giant began walking to the cashier while talking on the phone. Stan tried to find a way out the cart but other then jumping to his death it was a nearly impossible. Just then the giant began to put all the groceries on to the counter including the box of cookies that Stan has fallen on top of. "Finally I can get out of here" stated Stan as he leaped off the box of cookies and started running towards the cashier. Which happened to be a bit of a challenge as he conveyer belt was pushing Stan along with the groceries. The Cashier then wraps there hand around Stan pinning him against a bottle of whiskey the giant just so happened to be purchasing as well.

Stan screams at the Cashier to get their attention. Did They Listen?

Stan is an adopted teen living in a house with his family. Facing economic hardships, Stan shrinks himself to help out! Stan has always sort of wanted to be small and around giants but he never thought it would really happen!

Stan (You)-5'4 male who is always picked on for his height but secretly wants to be extremely smaller. His foster family treats him more like a friend than family.

Lisa- Your thick 45 year old hot foster mom who loves and cares for you but can be very strict. Adopted you a few years ago. F cup breasts with a curvy body and huge ass. 6 ft
